dishes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
dishes.description: A rich and creamy North Indian curry made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a spiced tomato and butter sauce.
steps: Heat butter in a pan, saut√© onions until translucent
Add ginger-garlic paste; cook until raw smell disappears
Add tomato puree and cook until oil separates
Mix in spices, then add paneer cubes
Simmer for 10 minutes, finish with cream
tips: Soak paneer in warm water to keep it soft
Use Kashmiri red chili for color without too much heat

dishes.name: Chana Masala
dishes.description: A flavorful chickpea curry cooked with aromatic spices, onions, and tomatoes, popular across India.
steps: Heat oil, add cumin seeds and let them splutter
Add onions and saut√© until golden brown
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Mix in spices and chickpeas with water
Simmer for 15-20 minutes
tips: Use canned chickpeas for quicker preparation
Add amchur (dry mango powder) for tanginess

dishes.name: Dal Tadka
dishes.description: A comforting lentil dish tempered with aromatic spices, garlic, and ghee, served with rice or roti.
steps: Pressure cook lentils with turmeric until soft
Heat ghee, add cumin seeds, garlic, and onions
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy
Mix in cooked lentils and simmer
Finish with a tempering of ghee with garlic
tips: Use a mix of toor dal and moong dal
Add kasuri methi for extra aroma

dishes.name: Aloo Gobi
dishes.description: A classic Punjabi dish featuring potatoes and cauliflower cooked with Indian spices in a dry style.
steps: Heat oil, add cumin seeds and let them splutter
Add onions and saut√© until translucent
Add ginger and tomatoes; cook until soft
Mix in spices and vegetables
Cover and cook on low heat until tender
tips: Don't overcook the cauliflower
Add peas for extra color and nutrition

dishes.name: Palak Paneer
dishes.description: A nutritious North Indian curry with paneer cubes in a creamy spinach puree, flavored with aromatic spices.
steps: Blanch spinach and blend with ginger-garlic
Heat oil, saut√© onions until golden
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add spinach puree and simmer
Add paneer cubes and cook for 5 minutes
tips: Blanch spinach quickly to retain color
Add a pinch of sugar to balance flavors

dishes.name: Malai Kofta
dishes.description: Delicious fried paneer and potato balls in a rich, creamy gravy, a luxurious vegetarian dish.
steps: Mix paneer, potatoes, and spices to form kofta balls
Deep fry until golden brown and set aside
Prepare gravy by saut√©ing onions, tomatoes, and cashew paste
Add spices and simmer until oil separates
Add cream and gently place koftas in gravy
tips: Keep kofta mixture chilled before frying
Add a pinch of sugar to balance acidity

dishes.name: Vegetable Biryani
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices in the dum style.
steps: Soak rice for 30 minutes
Marinate vegetables in yogurt and spices
Parboil rice until 70% cooked
Layer rice and vegetables in heavy-bottomed pot
Seal with dough and cook on low heat for 20 minutes
tips: Use aged basmati rice for best results
Add fried onions between layers for flavor

dishes.name: Rajma Chawal
dishes.description: Classic Punjabi red kidney beans curry served with steamed rice, a comfort food favorite.
steps: Pressure cook soaked beans until tender
Saut√© onions until golden brown
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes
Cook until oil separates, then add spices
Add cooked beans and simmer for 15 minutes
tips: Soak beans for at least 8 hours
Mash some beans to thicken the gravy

dishes.name: Dahi Bhalla
dishes.description: Soft lentil dumplings soaked in creamy yogurt and topped with sweet and spicy chutneys.
steps: Grind soaked dal to fluffy batter
Fry spoonfuls to make vadas
Soak in water, then squeeze out excess
Arrange in serving dish, top with yogurt
Drizzle chutneys and sprinkle spices
tips: Soak vadas in warm water for soft texture
Chill before serving for best taste

dishes.name: Pav Bhaji
dishes.description: Mumbai street food specialty - spicy mashed vegetable curry served with buttered bread rolls.
steps: Pressure cook vegetables until very soft
Mash thoroughly with potato masher
Saut√© onions, tomatoes, and spices
Add mashed vegetables and simmer
Serve hot with butter-toasted pav
tips: Use extra butter for authentic taste
Garnish with chopped onions and lemon

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.description: The classic Neapolitan pizza featuring simple, fresh ingredients: tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Preheat oven to 475¬∞F (245¬∞C)
Roll out dough on floured surface
Spread tomato sauce, leaving border
Arrange mozzarella slices evenly
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden
tips: Use pizza stone for crispier crust
Let dough rest before shaping

dishes.name: Pasta Primavera
dishes.description: A colorful pasta dish loaded with fresh spring vegetables in a light sauce, perfect for warm weather.
steps: Cook pasta according to package
Saut√© garlic until fragrant
Add vegetables and cook until crisp-tender
Toss with cooked pasta
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs
tips: Reserve pasta water to adjust sauce
Add red pepper flakes for kick

dishes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
dishes.description: Layers of breaded eggplant slices baked with marinara sauce and melted cheese, a vegetarian Italian classic.
steps: Salt eggplant slices and let sit 30 minutes
Dredge in flour, egg, then breadcrumbs
Fry until golden on both sides
Layer in baking dish with sauce and cheese
Bake at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for 25 minutes
tips: Use mandoline for even slices
Bake instead of fry for lighter version

dishes.name: Risotto ai Funghi
dishes.description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms and finished with Parmesan cheese, requiring constant stirring.
steps: Saut√© onions and garlic in olive oil
Add mushrooms and cook until soft
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes
Add stock one ladle at a time
Stir constantly until rice is al dente
tips: Keep stock at simmer for even cooking
Use mix of wild mushrooms for flavor

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.description: A simple, fresh Italian salad showcasing ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with olive oil.
steps: Arrange alternating slices of tomato and mozzarella
Tuck basil leaves between slices
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic
Season with salt and pepper
tips: Use heirloom tomatoes for best flavor
Make balsamic reduction for drizzle

dishes.name: Minestrone Soup
dishes.description: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with beans and pasta, perfect for cold days with crusty bread.
steps: Saut√© onions, carrots, and celery in olive oil
Add garlic and cook until fragrant
Add stock, tomatoes, and Parmesan rind
Simmer for 20 minutes
Add pasta and beans, cook until pasta is done
tips: Add greens like spinach at the end
Better the next day as flavors develop

dishes.name: Focaccia Bread
dishes.description: Classic Italian flatbread with dimpled surface, perfect for sandwiches or dipping in olive oil.
steps: Mix flour, water, yeast, and salt to form dough
Knead until smooth and elastic
Let rise until doubled in size
Press into oiled baking sheet, dimple surface
Drizzle with oil, sprinkle rosemary and salt
Bake at 425¬∞F (220¬∞C) for 20-25 minutes
tips: Use high-quality olive oil for best flavor
Let dough rise in warm place

dishes.name: Spinach Ricotta Stuffed Shells
dishes.description: Jumbo pasta shells filled with creamy ricotta and spinach mixture, baked in marinara sauce.
steps: Cook shells according to package, drain
Mix ricotta, spinach, egg, and seasonings
Stuff shells with cheese mixture
Spread sauce in baking dish, arrange shells
Top with more sauce and mozzarella
Bake at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for 25 minutes
tips: Squeeze spinach dry before mixing
Can be assembled ahead and refrigerated

dishes.name: Pesto Pasta
dishes.description: Classic Ligurian pasta dish featuring fresh basil pesto sauce with pine nuts and Parmesan.
steps: Cook pasta according to package
Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and cheese
With motor running, drizzle in olive oil
Toss pesto with hot pasta
Add pasta water as needed to loosen sauce
tips: Toast pine nuts lightly for deeper flavor
Reserve some cooking water to adjust consistency

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa.
steps: Beat egg yolks with sugar until pale
Mix in mascarpone until smooth
Whisk egg whites to stiff peaks
Fold into mascarpone mixture
Layer with coffee-dipped ladyfingers
Chill for at least 4 hours
tips: Use freshly brewed espresso
Chill overnight for best texture

dishes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
dishes.description: A quick and healthy mix of colorful vegetables cooked in a wok with garlic, ginger, and light sauce.
steps: Heat oil in wok over high heat
Add garlic and ginger; stir for 30 seconds
Add vegetables starting with hardest ones first
Stir fry for 4-5 minutes until crisp-tender
Add sauce and toss to coat
tips: Keep heat high and keep stirring
Add cashews for extra crunch

dishes.name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
dishes.description: Crispy fried rolls filled with shredded vegetables, served with sweet chili or soy dipping sauce.
steps: Saut√© garlic and vegetables until softened
Let filling cool before wrapping
Place filling on wrapper, fold sides, roll tightly
Fry in hot oil until golden brown
Drain on paper towels
tips: Keep wrappers covered with damp cloth
Bake at 400¬∞F (200¬∞C) for healthier version

dishes.name: Mapo Tofu (Vegetarian)
dishes.description: A spicy Sichuan-style tofu dish with mushrooms replacing the traditional pork, in a fiery chili bean sauce.
steps: Toast Sichuan peppercorns and grind coarsely
Saut√© garlic, ginger, and doubanjiang
Add mushrooms and cook until softened
Add stock and bring to simmer
Gently add tofu cubes and simmer
tips: Use soft tofu for authentic texture
Adjust spice level to preference

dishes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
dishes.description: A versatile dish of stir-fried rice with mixed vegetables, customizable with whatever veggies you have on hand.
steps: Heat oil, scramble eggs if using, then remove
Saut√© garlic until fragrant
Add vegetables and stir fry for 2 minutes
Add rice, breaking up any clumps
Stir in soy sauce and white pepper
tips: Use day-old rice for best texture
High heat prevents mushiness

dishes.name: Hot and Sour Soup
dishes.description: A bold-flavored Chinese soup with tofu and mushrooms, featuring the perfect balance of spicy and tangy flavors.
steps: Bring stock to boil, add mushrooms
Add tofu, vinegar, soy sauce, and pepper
Thicken with cornstarch slurry
Slowly drizzle in beaten egg while stirring
Finish with sesame oil
tips: Adjust vinegar and pepper to taste
Add wood ear mushrooms for texture

dishes.name: Vegetable Lo Mein
dishes.description: Stir-fried noodles with crisp vegetables in a savory sauce, a Chinese takeout favorite made healthier at home.
steps: Cook noodles according to package, drain
Heat oil in wok, stir-fry garlic until fragrant
Add vegetables and stir-fry until crisp-tender
Add noodles and sauce ingredients
Toss everything together until well combined
tips: Use fresh Chinese egg noodles for best texture
Add a splash of vegetarian oyster sauce for depth

dishes.name: Vegetable Dumplings
dishes.description: Delicate dough wrappers filled with seasoned vegetables, steamed or pan-fried to perfection.
steps: Salt cabbage and squeeze out excess water
Mix all filling ingredients thoroughly
Place small amount of filling in each wrapper
Fold and pleat edges to seal
Steam for 8-10 minutes or pan-fry until crispy
tips: Keep wrappers covered to prevent drying
Make extra and freeze for later use

dishes.name: Buddha's Delight
dishes.description: A Buddhist vegetarian classic featuring an assortment of vegetables, tofu, and mushrooms in light sauce.
steps: Blanch tougher vegetables first
Stir-fry garlic and ginger in hot oil
Add ingredients in order of cooking time
Add sauce and simmer briefly
Thicken with cornstarch slurry if desired
tips: Use high heat for authentic stir-fry
Add a splash of Shaoxing wine for depth

dishes.name: Scallion Pancakes
dishes.description: Flaky, layered flatbreads with scallions, crispy on the outside and tender inside, served with dipping sauce.
steps: Mix flour with boiling water to form dough
Knead until smooth, rest for 30 minutes
Divide into portions, roll out thinly
Brush with sesame oil, sprinkle scallions and salt
Roll up like jelly roll, then coil into spiral
Flatten and pan-fry until golden
tips: Don't skip the resting time for dough
Use medium heat to cook through without burning

dishes.name: Sweet and Sour Tofu
dishes.description: Crispy tofu cubes tossed in vibrant sweet and sour sauce with bell peppers and pineapple.
steps: Press tofu to remove excess water
Coat tofu in cornstarch and pan-fry until crispy
Saut√© vegetables until crisp-tender
Combine sauce ingredients in separate pan
Add tofu and vegetables to sauce, toss to coat
tips: Use fresh pineapple for best flavor
Double fry tofu for extra crispiness

dishes.name: Vegetable Quesadillas
dishes.description: Crispy tortillas filled with melted cheese and saut√©ed vegetables, perfect for a quick and satisfying meal.
steps: Saut√© vegetables with spices until tender
Place cheese and vegetables on half of each tortilla
Fold over and cook in dry skillet
Flip until golden on both sides
Cut into wedges and serve
tips: Use mix of cheeses for better flavor
Press with spatula while cooking

dishes.name: Vegetable Enchiladas
dishes.description: Corn tortillas rolled around a spiced vegetable filling, smothered in enchilada sauce and melted cheese.
steps: Saut√© onions, garlic, and vegetables
Mix with beans and 1/2 cup enchilada sauce
Dip tortillas in warm sauce to soften
Fill with mixture, roll up, place in baking dish
Top with remaining sauce and cheese
Bake at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for 20 minutes
tips: Warm tortillas slightly to prevent cracking
Let sit 5 minutes after baking

dishes.name: Vegetable Fajitas
dishes.description: Sizzling platter of charred vegetables served with warm tortillas and all the classic fajita fixings.
steps: Toss vegetables with seasoning
Heat oil in large skillet over high heat
Add vegetables and cook until charred but crisp-tender
Serve with warm tortillas
tips: Don't overcrowd the pan
Use cast iron skillet for best results

dishes.name: Vegetable Tacos
dishes.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with roasted sweet potatoes, black beans, and fresh toppings for a colorful meal.
steps: Toss sweet potatoes with spices and roast at 400¬∞F (200¬∞C)
Warm tortillas according to package
Assemble tacos with sweet potatoes and beans
Add toppings like avocado and salsa
Serve with lime wedges
tips: Double roast sweet potatoes for caramelization
Char tortillas slightly for flavor

dishes.name: Vegetable Tamales
dishes.description: Traditional Mexican masa dough steamed in corn husks with a savory vegetable and cheese filling.
steps: Beat shortening until fluffy, mix in masa ingredients
Spread masa on soaked corn husks
Add vegetable filling in center
Fold husks and tie ends
Steam for 45-60 minutes
tips: Soak corn husks in warm water for 30+ minutes
Test masa by floating small piece in water

dishes.name: Chiles Rellenos
dishes.description: Poblano peppers stuffed with cheese, battered and fried, served with tomato sauce - a Mexican classic.
steps: Char peppers until blackened, then peel
Make slit, remove seeds, stuff with cheese
Beat egg whites, fold in yolks for batter
Dust peppers with flour, dip in batter
Fry until golden, serve with warm sauce
tips: Wear gloves when handling hot peppers
Make sauce while peppers roast

dishes.name: Mexican Street Corn (Elote)
dishes.description: Grilled corn on the cob slathered with creamy chili-lime mayo and crumbled cheese - irresistible street food.
steps: Grill corn until lightly charred
Mix mayo with lime juice and chili powder
Slather corn with mayo mixture
Sprinkle with cheese and more chili powder
Serve with lime wedges
tips: Use Mexican crema instead of mayo if available
Can be made with boiled corn too

dishes.name: Black Bean Soup
dishes.description: Hearty and flavorful soup made with black beans, vegetables, and Mexican spices, topped with avocado.
steps: Saut√© onions, garlic, and spices
Add beans and stock, bring to boil
Simmer for 20 minutes
Blend half the soup for creaminess
Serve with avocado, cilantro, and lime
tips: Use canned beans for quicker preparation
Add a chipotle pepper for smokiness

dishes.name: Mexican Rice (Arroz Rojo)
dishes.description: Fluffy rice cooked with tomatoes, onions, and garlic - the perfect side for any Mexican meal.
steps: Rinse rice until water runs clear
Saut√© rice in oil until golden
Add onion and garlic, cook until soft
Add tomato puree and cook until thickened
Add broth, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes
tips: Don't stir after adding broth
Let rest covered for 5 minutes after cooking

dishes.name: Chilaquiles
dishes.description: Crispy tortilla chips simmered in salsa, topped with cheese, crema, and eggs - perfect for brunch.
steps: Fry or bake tortilla chips until crisp
Heat salsa in large skillet
Add chips and toss to coat
Cook until chips soften slightly
Top with cheese, crema, and fried eggs
tips: Use day-old tortillas for better chips
Adjust salsa heat to preference

dishes.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
dishes.description: Individual chocolate cakes with a molten center that flows out when cut into, served warm with ice cream.
steps: Melt chocolate and butter together
Whisk eggs and sugar until pale
Fold in chocolate mixture, then flour
Pour into greased ramekins
Bake at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for 10-12 minutes
tips: Don't overbake - centers should be jiggly
Can be prepared ahead and refrigerated

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa.
steps: Beat egg yolks with sugar until pale
Mix in mascarpone until smooth
Whisk egg whites to stiff peaks
Fold into mascarpone mixture
Layer with coffee-dipped ladyfingers
Chill for at least 4 hours
tips: Use freshly brewed espresso
Chill overnight for best texture

dishes.name: Fruit Tart
dishes.description: Buttery shortcrust pastry filled with vanilla pastry cream and topped with fresh seasonal fruits.
steps: Make crust by pulsing dry ingredients with butter
Press into tart pan and chill 30 minutes
Bake at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for 15 minutes
Cool completely, fill with pastry cream
Arrange fruit decoratively on top
Glaze with warmed apricot jam
tips: Blind bake crust with weights
Pat fruit dry before arranging

dishes.name: Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e
dishes.description: Classic French dessert featuring rich vanilla custard with a contrasting layer of hard caramelized sugar on top.
steps: Heat cream with vanilla until simmering
Whisk yolks with sugar and salt
Temper yolks with hot cream, then strain
Pour into ramekins and bake in water bath
Chill for at least 4 hours
Sprinkle with sugar and caramelize with torch
tips: Strain mixture for silky texture
Let custards cool in water bath

dishes.name: Cheesecake
dishes.description: Creamy New York-style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, perfect plain or with fruit topping.
steps: Mix crumbs with melted butter, press into pan
Bake at 325¬∞F (160¬∞C) for 10 minutes
Beat cream cheese until smooth, add sugar
Add eggs one at a time, then sour cream
Pour over crust and bake for 50-60 minutes
Cool in oven with door ajar, then chill overnight
tips: Use room temperature ingredients
Run knife around edge after baking

dishes.name: Chocolate Mousse
dishes.description: Light yet decadent French dessert made with whipped cream and melted chocolate, with an airy texture.
steps: Melt chocolate over double boiler
Whip cream to soft peaks
Beat egg whites with sugar to stiff peaks
Fold chocolate into cream gently
Carefully fold in egg whites
Chill for at least 4 hours

Don't overmix when combining ingredients

dishes.name: Apple Pie
dishes.description: Classic American dessert with flaky crust and cinnamon-spiced apple filling, best served warm.
steps: Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and flour
Line pie dish with bottom crust
Add apple filling, dot with butter
Cover with top crust, vent steam
Bake at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for 50 minutes

Brush crust with egg wash for shine

dishes.name: Panna Cotta
dishes.description: Italian cooked cream dessert set with gelatin, silky smooth and often served with berry sauce.
steps: Bloom gelatin in cold milk
Heat cream and sugar until steaming
Add gelatin mixture and stir to dissolve
Strain into ramekins and chill 4+ hours
Serve with berry compote or caramel
tips: Don't boil the cream mixture
Dip ramekins in hot water to unmold

dishes.name: Red Velvet Cake
dishes.description: Striking red-colored cake with subtle cocoa flavor, paired with creamy cheese frosting.
steps: Cream butter and sugar until light
Add eggs one at a time
Alternate dry ingredients with buttermilk
Add coloring and vanilla
Bake at 350¬∞F (175¬∞C) for 25-30 minutes
Frost with cream cheese frosting when cool

Don't overmix the batter

dishes.name: Baklava
dishes.description: Sweet Middle Eastern pastry made of phyllo dough layers with nuts and honey syrup.
steps: Mix nuts with sugar and cinnamon
Layer phyllo sheets, brushing with butter
Add nut mixture every few layers
Cut before baking at 350¬∞F (175¬∞C) for 45 minutes
Pour cooled syrup over hot baklava

Let baklava sit overnight before serving

dishes.name: Mango Lassi
dishes.description: A refreshing Indian yogurt-based drink blending sweet mango with creamy yogurt and a hint of cardamom.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth
Adjust sweetness to taste
Serve chilled, garnished with cardamom
tips: Use frozen mango for thicker texture
Add pinch of saffron for special occasions

dishes.name: Mojito (Virgin)
dishes.description: A refreshing mocktail version of the classic mojito, with lime, mint, and soda water for a cooling drink.
steps: Muddle lime wedges, mint, and sugar in glass
Fill glass with ice
Top with soda water and stir gently
Garnish with extra mint and lime wedge
tips: Slap mint leaves before adding to release oils
Use brown sugar for deeper flavor

dishes.name: Smoothie Bowl
dishes.description: A thick, creamy smoothie served in a bowl and topped with fresh fruits, nuts, and seeds for a nutritious breakfast.
steps: Blend frozen fruits with yogurt and milk until thick
Pour into bowl
Arrange toppings artistically
Serve immediately
tips: Use frozen fruit for thicker consistency
Add spinach or kale for hidden greens

dishes.name: Iced Matcha Latte
dishes.description: A refreshing Japanese-inspired drink featuring vibrant green matcha powder blended with milk over ice.
steps: Whisk matcha with hot water until frothy
Add honey and stir to dissolve
Fill glass with ice, add milk
Pour matcha mixture over milk
Stir gently before drinking
tips: Sift matcha powder to prevent clumps
Use a bamboo whisk for authentic preparation

dishes.name: Hot Chocolate
dishes.description: A rich, comforting drink made with real chocolate melted into warm milk, topped with whipped cream.
steps: Heat milk gently until steaming but not boiling
Whisk in chocolate until melted
Add cocoa powder and sugar if using
Stir in vanilla
Pour into mugs and top with whipped cream
tips: Use high-quality chocolate for best flavor
Add a pinch of cinnamon or chili for variation

dishes.name: Strawberry Lemonade
dishes.description: Sweet-tart homemade lemonade with fresh strawberry puree for a fruity twist on the classic.
steps: Make simple syrup by heating sugar with 1 cup water
Blend strawberries into puree
Mix lemon juice, strawberry puree, and syrup
Add remaining water and chill
Serve over ice with strawberry garnish
tips: Adjust sweetness to taste
Muddle mint leaves for herbal variation

dishes.name: Chai Tea Latte
dishes.description: Spiced Indian tea with milk, combining black tea with warming spices like cardamom and ginger.
steps: Crush spices lightly to release flavors
Simmer spices in water for 5 minutes
Add tea and steep for 3-4 minutes
Add milk and heat until steaming
Strain and sweeten to taste
tips: Use whole spices for best flavor
Froth milk for cafe-style presentation

dishes.name: Bubble Tea
dishes.description: Taiwanese milk tea with chewy tapioca pearls, customizable with different flavors and toppings.
steps: Cook tapioca pearls according to package
Make syrup by melting brown sugar with water
Toss cooked pearls in some syrup
Mix tea with milk and remaining syrup
Assemble with pearls, ice, and tea mixture
tips: Use quick-cooking pearls for convenience
Adjust sweetness to preference

dishes.name: Turmeric Golden Milk
dishes.description: Warming Ayurvedic drink with turmeric, ginger, and milk, known for its anti-inflammatory properties.
steps: Whisk all ingredients except honey in saucepan
Heat gently until steaming but not boiling
Strain if desired
Sweeten with honey if using
Serve warm
tips: Add coconut oil for creaminess
Black pepper enhances turmeric absorption

dishes.name: Watermelon Agua Fresca
dishes.description: Light and refreshing Mexican-style fruit drink made with blended watermelon and lime.
steps: Blend watermelon until smooth
Strain through fine mesh sieve
Add water and lime juice
Chill and serve over ice

tips: Use very ripe watermelon for sweetness
Add a splash of soda water for fizz

dishes.name: Greek Salad
dishes.description: Fresh and vibrant salad with crisp vegetables, olives, and feta cheese, dressed with olive oil and oregano.
steps: Combine all vegetables in large bowl
Add olives and feta cheese
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Sprinkle with dried oregano
Toss gently and serve
tips: Use ripe, in-season tomatoes
Let salad sit for 10 minutes before serving

dishes.name: Hummus
dishes.description: Creamy Middle Eastern chickpea dip with tahini, lemon, and garlic, perfect with pita bread.
steps: Drain chickpeas, reserve some liquid
Blend all ingredients until smooth
Add reserved liquid as needed for consistency
Drizzle with olive oil to serve
Garnish with paprika and parsley
tips: Peel chickpeas for extra smooth texture
Adjust lemon and garlic to taste

dishes.name: Falafel
dishes.description: Crispy fried chickpea patties with herbs and spices, a popular Middle Eastern street food.
steps: Drain soaked chickpeas
Pulse all ingredients in food processor
Form into small patties
Fry in hot oil until golden brown
Drain on paper towels
tips: Don't use canned chickpeas
Chill mixture before forming for better texture

dishes.name: Baba Ganoush
dishes.description: Smoky roasted eggplant dip with tahini, garlic, and lemon, a delicious alternative to hummus.
steps: Pierce eggplants and roast at 400¬∞F (200¬∞C) until collapsed
Scoop out flesh, drain excess liquid
Blend with remaining ingredients
Season with salt to taste
Drizzle with olive oil to serve
tips: Char eggplant over flame for extra smokiness
Let cool to room temperature before serving

dishes.name: Tabbouleh
dishes.description: Fresh Lebanese parsley salad with bulgur wheat, tomatoes, and mint, dressed with lemon and olive oil.
steps: Soak bulgur in hot water for 20 minutes, drain
Combine with chopped herbs and vegetables
Whisk together lemon juice and olive oil
Toss with salad ingredients
Season with salt and pepper
tips: Use flat-leaf parsley for best texture
Let flavors meld for 30 minutes before serving

dishes.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves (Dolmas)
dishes.description: Tender grape leaves stuffed with herbed rice mixture, served as appetizer or main dish.
steps: Blanch fresh grape leaves if using
Saut√© onion, then mix with rice and herbs
Place small amount of filling on each leaf
Roll tightly, tucking in sides
Arrange in pot, cover with water and lemon slices
Simmer for 45 minutes
tips: Use short-grain rice for best texture
Weight dolmas with plate while cooking

dishes.name: Shakshuka
dishes.description: North African dish of eggs poached in spicy tomato and pepper sauce, perfect for brunch.
steps: Saut√© onions and peppers until soft
Add tomatoes and spices, simmer for 15 minutes
Make wells in sauce, crack eggs into them
Cover and cook until eggs are set
Garnish with parsley and feta
tips: Use canned tomatoes for convenience
Bake in oven for more even cooking

dishes.name: Moussaka
dishes.description: Greek layered eggplant dish with spiced lentils (vegetarian version) and creamy b√©chamel sauce.
steps: Salt eggplant slices and let sit, then pat dry
Roast eggplant until tender
Prepare lentil-tomato sauce with spices
Layer eggplant and sauce in baking dish
Top with b√©chamel and bake until golden
tips: Press eggplant to remove excess moisture
Let rest 15 minutes before serving

dishes.name: Pita Bread
dishes.description: Soft and pillowy Middle Eastern flatbread with pocket, perfect for dipping or stuffing.
steps: Proof yeast with sugar and warm water
Mix flour and salt, add yeast mixture and oil
Knead until smooth and elastic
Let rise until doubled
Divide and roll into thin circles
Bake at 475¬∞F (245¬∞C) until puffed
tips: Use bread flour for better pocket formation
Bake on preheated baking stone or steel

dishes.name: Turkish Delight
dishes.description: Classic Middle Eastern confection with chewy texture and floral flavors, dusted with powdered sugar.
steps: Dissolve sugar in water, boil to soft ball stage
Mix cornstarch with water, cook until thick
Combine sugar syrup with cornstarch mixture
Cook for about 1 hour, stirring constantly
Add flavoring and coloring
Pour into oiled pan, let set overnight
Cut and dust with powdered sugar
tips: Use candy thermometer for precision
Line pan with parchment for easy removal
